statements: DELETE FROM product_recalls WHERE product_name = 'Apple' AND batch_number = 1234;
DELETE FROM product_recalls WHERE product_name = 'Apple iPhone' AND batch_number = 1234;
DELETE FROM product_recalls WHERE batch_number = 5678 AND recall_reason LIKE '%safety%';
DELETE FROM recall_tracking WHERE recall_date > '2022-01-01' AND recall_reason = 'Expired Product';
DELETE FROM batch_tracking_product WHERE production_date < '2021-06-15' AND expiration_date < '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM recall_notifications WHERE notification_type = 'Urgent' AND notification_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM recalled_batches WHERE reason LIKE '%contamination%' AND recall_date > '2021-06-01';
DELETE FROM recalls WHERE product_id = 500 AND batch_id = 1001;
DELETE FROM batches WHERE manufacturing_location = 'Warehouse A';
